archival_memory.health_concerns: aching joints, needing more rest, lower energy levels
archival_memory.health_intent: more intentional about health to stay strong and independent
archival_memory.diet_focus: more protein, healthy fats, fiber, cooking at home
archival_memory.food_preferences: grilled salmon with roasted vegetables, avoiding processed foods
archival_memory.exercise_changes: focus on consistency over intensity, daily walking, strength training
archival_memory.exercise_routine: walking daily, light weights and resistance bands a few times a week
archival_memory.sleep_changes: need for 7-8 hours of sleep, previously fine on 5-6 hours
archival_memory.sleep_hygiene: no screens an hour before bed, cool and dark room, consistent schedule
archival_memory.skin_care_changes: focus on hydration and sunscreen, wear SPF daily
archival_memory.hydration_practices: drink a lot of water, especially during winter
archival_memory.skin_products: retinol cream at night for skin health
archival_memory.social_connections_importance: importance of social connections for mental well-being
archival_memory.social_activities: weekly coffee with friends, joined a book club
archival_memory.memory_changes: more moments of forgetfulness, like misplacing keys
archival_memory.brain_sharpness_activities: doing puzzles, reading, learning new skills, online class on art history
archival_memory.chronic_pain_management: managing osteoarthritis, worsens in colder months, stiff joints
archival_memory.pain_relief_methods: warm baths with Epsom salts, heating pad in the mornings
archival_memory.attitude_towards_aging: embracing aging, recognizing challenges and wisdom from experience
archival_memory.life_advice: don't stress about small stuff, take care of health early, enjoy every stage of life
